description.value:
A boreal staff is chiseled from a cylinder of ice to form a spiky, jagged icicle, its surface gleaming with the colors of the northern lights. It gives the air around you a distinct chill. When used as a weapon, a boreal staff is a +3 greater striking frost staff.

Activate1 command

Frequency once per 10 minutes

Effect Attempt a Strike using the staff. That Strike deals @Damage[2d4[cold]] additional damage. This additional cold damage ignores cold resistance.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gYjPm7YwGtEa1oxh]{Ray of Frost}
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.8TQiFzGf4feoHeH0]{Chilling Spray}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.W6QlRwQLPoBSw6PZ]{Snowball}
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.8TQiFzGf4feoHeH0]{Chilling Spray}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.W6QlRwQLPoBSw6PZ]{Snowball}
  • 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.8TQiFzGf4feoHeH0]{Chilling Spray}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9TauMFkIsmvKJNzZ]{Elemental Absorption} (water only)
  • 4th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.8TQiFzGf4feoHeH0]{Chilling Spray}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.kHyjQbibRGPNCixx]{Ice Storm}
  • 5th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.3puDanGfpEt6jK5k]{Cone of Cold}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.CcXtbTxtdV9MKQfu]{Mantle of the Frozen Heart}
  • 6th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.3puDanGfpEt6jK5k]{Cone of Cold}
  • 7th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.3puDanGfpEt6jK5k]{Cone of Cold}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.vFkz0gVBUT2gGnm1]{Frigid Flurry}

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.
